job.title: Principal Software Engineer - Data Science/Machine Learning/AI
job.industry: Financial Services,Information Services,Information Technology and Services
job.description: stronguJob SummarybrbrustrongOur Product Engineering team is seeking a Principal Software Engineer to build GLGs platform that matches companies around the world with the experts and professionals who can help them make well informed important decisions on demand  Working on one of our selforganizing teams youll pair with other engineers product managers and users to set and achieve goals that will help GLG continue to define the future of work GLGs ability to utilize search and match to find the right individuals out of our network of 900000 for our clients needs is the foundation of our business Your work will be supporting this crucial parts of our business inbrul liemSearch  emWorking closely with our internal research team we provide advanced search tools that let our research managers pinpoint the right people to introduce to our customers for each project By integrating more and more data we are constantly striving to boost recall while maintaining high numbers for accuracy and keeping an interface that is simple and intuitiveli liemArtificial Intelligence  emWe currently make 10 of our matches with AI and machine learning techniques and are looking to steadily increase that percentage This is a great start but there is huge opportunity to improve our accuracy and scaleli brbrulWe are a rapidly growing engineering organization with a lot of programmers and relatively few managers and value results and flexibility over process and dogma The Product Engineering team builds the platform technology that connects GLGs clients to our experts Our team of product software engineers and product managers are responsible for GLGs technology initiatives and product developmentbrbrstronguSpecific Responsibilities Include but Are Not Limited Tobrustrongul liBuild and drive solutions using the technologies you and your team chooseli liCollaborate with engineering leadership to create a technical vision for future productsli liDevelop applications using modern technologies and tools including React Nodejs JavaScript TypeScript Python Golang Serverless computing SQL PyTorch Tensorflow NLP etcli liMentor and pair with other developers honing your coding software design and leadership skillsetsli brbrulstronguAn Ideal Candidate Will Have The Followingbrustrongul liAt least 8 years of experience as a software engineer building applications and servicebased systemsli liBachelors Degree in computer science or engineering is preferredli liMust be knowledgeable in statistical and machine learning conceptsli liStrong Python and SQL are requiredli liExperience leading data projects and pushing production quality code including deploying and assessing efficacy of a wide array of Machine Learning models in production environments is requiredli liA passion for investigating data patterns and turning them into profitable business opportunitiesli liStrong communication and collaboration skills and the ability to educate other team members on modern technologies and coding patternsli liA desire to participate in all aspects of the development lifecycle from inception to implementation and support li liThe ability to thrive and in a selfdirected environment li liConcrete mentorship skills li brbrulstronguAbout GLG  Gerson Lehrman GroupbrbrustrongGLG is the worlds insight network Our clients rely on GLGs from Fortune 500 corporations to leading technology companies to professional services firms and financial institutions We connect our clients to the worlds largest and most varied source of firsthand
